title: How the super-rich are sparing no expense on their death: from rockets into space to Hollywood-glam wakes
text:
Death is the last frontier for avid consumers. And the famous and the wealthy are sparing no expense in their bids for immortality – from rockets into space to Hollywood-glam wakes.

Death is hard to talk about. Funerals can be even harder to discuss. For the dying or deceased, and their survivors, a service that is meaningful and memorable, celebratory and reverent takes some serious planning. Not to mention knowing the right people.

Get ready to chat about it all. The US and Europe are about to experience what is being called a 'death boom', as the largest segment of the population – those born after the Second World War – enter their 70s and 80s.
